title: Can i delete my acount?
body:
I want to delete my acount on eu nordic and east.
How can i do that?
I need my email on EU west, thats the reason.

replies.body:
You actually don't need to delete your account to use an email on another account. You can use the same email on different accounts, even when they're on the same server! If you get a message during registration that says your email is being used, you can use another email and then change it via your Account Settings/Protection page.

https://account.leagueoflegends.com/euw/en/protect

Hope that helps!

Wuks' info is spot on, but I would add that you make sure you have access to that temporary email.  You'll be sent a confirmation email when attempting to switch it back to your main address.  Let me know if you have any questions!
